content.rendered:
Hello, I wanted to introduce you to my server that I host at Nitrado together with a friend.

The name of the server is Spacecraft.

This basically tells you the most important things about the server.

Spacecraft is a space Rp PvP nation (<---planned)

What do we offer?:

Build your own spaceship from a small escape pod to a proud frigate and steer it through the endless expanses

Join a nation or found one yourself.

Conquer asteroids, planets or even entire solar systems

and become the ruler of the universe!

Get ready for exciting dogfights with your spaceship, fight alone or form a fleet of ships.

If you ever get enough from fighting or gathering resources,

you can come to the neutral space station.

There is free food and also apartments, hangars, shops and embassies for rent

(Not everything is ready yet like the shops, the nations and the embassies but these will be added soon)

The IP is RAT5.minecraft.to

Forum: http://space-craft.xobor.de/

(The server has only 4 slots and is on version 1.6.2 of course it can be slotted if necessary)

(You are still a guest at the beginning for security reasons)

Sincerely with admin

astraxrazor

(PS if someone knows a good nations plugin please post it below or PM me thanks )

Here are a couple more screens

edited October 8, 2013 by astraxrazor
